page.keywords: roblox, roblox bus sim, roblox bus simulator, roblox bus sim wiki, wiki, bus sim wiki, roblox bus sim wiki

header.title: Bus Simulator Wiki
header.description: Welcome to the Officialy endorsed Bus Simulator Community Wiki!

content.text: The Bus Simulator Wiki has been moved over 2 times already. With the previous two being made in fandom, although this one is no longer hosted on fandom due to their practices.

content.sectionDescription: Bus Simulator is a game that was created in 2018 on ROBLOX, and was made as a small little socialization project at first, but kept getting more updates from there, taking on many expansive updates that immerse you in the comedic world of events on a bus that is forever waiting for its real stop, unsure if you will actually reach it.

content.text: You can also join the game's Official Roblox Group, and their Discord Server! Join the conversations in the FrostBitten Server, too!
You must be 13+ to use Discord and Join the servers.

content.sectionDescription:
You can browse the Bus Simulator wiki from the sidebar!
This wiki doesn't support Mobile Phones yet, although the site is resized on mobile phones to atleast see content.
